name: Motion Intent
description:
Values

  • natural: Physics-based, smooth (Default).
  • immediate: Zero latency, no transitions (High productivity).
  • reduced: Respects `prefers-reduced-motion` strictly.

name: Density Intent
description:
Values

  • comfortable: Standard touch-friendly targets (Default).
  • compact: Information dense, mouse-first (Enterprise).
  • wafer: Extreme density for complex tooling.

name: Interaction Intent
description:
Values

  • pointer: Hover states enabled, scrollbars visible.
  • touch: Larger hit areas, swipe gestures enabled.
  • gamepad: Focus snapping, spatial navigation priority.
